sentence.Network_en: To emancipate all mankind, we will balk at no sacrifice . even that of our lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了全人类的解放, 即使牺牲生命也在所不惜.

sentence.Network_en: Even biology undergraduates may balk at animal experiments.
sentence.Network_cn: 面对动物实验，哪怕是生物专业的大学生也会畏缩。

sentence.Network_en: Even a single man bad been able to balk him.

entry.def: If you balk at something, you definitely do not want to do it or to let it happen.

example.ex: Even biology undergraduates may balk at animal experiments...
example.tran: 面对动物实验，哪怕是生物专业的大学生也会畏缩。

example.ex: Last October the bank balked, alarmed that a $24m profit had turned into a $20m deficit.
example.tran: 去年10月，由于对2,400万美元的利润变成了2,000万的亏损感到担心，这家银行畏缩了。

means.word_mean: 1. the area on a billiard table behind the balkline;

sentences.sentence: "a player with ball in hand must play from the balk"

means.word_mean: 2. something immaterial that interferes with or delays action or progress
3. one of several parallel sloping beams that support a roof
4. an illegal pitching motion while runners are on base

auth_sentence.content: To justify their actions, the balk at it.
auth_sentence.res_content: To justify their actions, the balk at it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To justify their actions, the balk at it.

auth_sentence.content: But developing countries balk at that for two reasons.
auth_sentence.res_content: But developing countries balk at that for two reasons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But developing countries balk at that for two reasons.

auth_sentence.content: Before you balk at the name, check the back story.
auth_sentence.res_content: Before you balk at the name, check the back story.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Before you balk at the name, check the back story.

sentences.en: I wanted to buy the dress, but I balked at the high price.
sentences.cn: 我本想买这件连衣裙, 但一看价钱太高就犹豫了。
